## ElementCSSBoxDimensions.borderBox property

The border box as specified in the [CSS Box Model](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-box-3/#valdef-box-border-box)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
borderBox: CSSBox;
```

## Remarks

Margin, padding and content boxes can be derived from [ElementCSSBoxDimensions.computedStyle](./webshell.elementcssboxdimensions.computedstyle.md)<!-- -->.
